mapper.select: SELECT stat_date, api_cd, ccm.com_cd_nm as api_nm, count(*) tot_cnt FROM mera_stat_info mi left join com_cd_mltl ccm on ccm.com_cd = mi.api_cd and ccm.langg_cd='CM00100002' WHERE stat_date >= #{search.startDate} and stat_date <= #{search.endDate} GROUP BY stat_date, api_cd ORDER BY stat_date desc, tot_cnt desc
